data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 1,925,514 believers in the state of Arizona to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Arizona, United States
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Arizona, United States that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Arizona, United States.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, guide the church in Arizona, United States to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 1,925,514 believers in Arizona, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Please, teach the 1,925,514 believers in Arizona, United States how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Arizona, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Arizona that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.
